ShuttleCrash_Rescue.questContentRules.ru.li: failLetterEndingCommon->You have failed the quest '[resolvedQuestName]'.
successLetterEndingCommon->You have succesfully completed the quest '[resolvedQuestName]'.
goodwillSomeCiviliansLost->Not all the [asker_faction_pawnSingular] [pawnLabel] could be rescued. [goodwillNegativelyAffected]
goodwillAllCiviliansLost->None of the [asker_faction_pawnSingular] [pawnLabelPlural] could be rescued. [goodwillNegativelyAffected]
goodwillNegativelyAffected->Your goodwill with [asker_faction_name] has been negatively affected for every [pawnLabel] left.
commanderLandingDesc->[asker_nameDef], the commander who asked to land [asker_possessive] shuttle at [map_definite]
raidArrivedLetterLabel->Raid: [enemyFaction_name]

raidArrivedLetterText->[enemyFaction_pawnsPlural] from the [enemyFaction_name] have arrived. They will attack the [asker_faction_pawnsPlural] who crashed at [map_definite].\n\nDefend the [asker_faction_pawnsPlural] until their rescue shuttle arrives in [rescueShuttleAfterRaidDelay_duration].
rescueShuttleArrivedLetterLabel->Rescue shuttle arrived

rescueShuttleArrivedLetterText->The rescue shuttle has arrived to collect the [pawnLabelSingleOrPlural] who crashed landed. Make sure to have these people on the shuttle before it leaves in [rescueDelay_duration]:\n\n[civilians]
questCompletedSuccessLetterLabel->Quest completed: [resolvedQuestName]
questCompletedSuccessLetterText->[commanderLandingDesc], has escaped. [asker_pronoun] is grateful for the help [asker_pronoun] received at [map_definite].\n\n[successLetterEndingCommon]
questCompletedCiviliansLostSuccessLetterLabel->Quest completed: [resolvedQuestName]

questCompletedCiviliansLostSuccessLetterText->[commanderLandingDesc], has escaped.

[goodwillSomeCiviliansLost]

[successLetterEndingCommon]
askerLostLetterLabel->Quest failed: [resolvedQuestName]

askerLostLetterText->[commanderLandingDesc] was not on board when the shuttle departed.

[goodwillSomeCiviliansLost]

[failLetterEndingCommon]
allLostLetterLabel->Quest failed: [resolvedQuestName]

allLostLetterText->The rescue shuttle for the crashed [asker_faction_pawnsPlural] has departed without anyone on board.

[goodwillAllCiviliansLost]

[failLetterEndingCommon]
askerDiedLetterLabel->Quest failed: [resolvedQuestName]
askerDiedLetterText->[commanderLandingDesc] has died.\n\n[failLetterEndingCommon]
shuttleDestroyedLetterLabel->Quest failed: [resolvedQuestName]
shuttleDestroyedLetterText->The shuttle sent to collect the crashed [asker_faction_pawnsPlural] has been destroyed. The [asker_faction_pawnsPlural] will now leave on foot.\n\n[failLetterEndingCommon]

ShuttleCrash_Rescue.questDescriptionRule.li:
questDescription->A shuttle of [asker_faction_name] has taken damage and is seeking a place to land. Its commander [asker_nameDef] wants to land at [map_definite].

[enemyFaction_pawnsPlural] from [enemyFaction_name] will attack the crashed shuttle site in an attempt to kill its occupants. You must defend them.

The shuttle contains [asker_nameDef][andOtherCivilians] and [soldiers_count] [soldiers0_kind]s. The commander [andCivilians] must be rescued, but the [soldiers0_kind]s may be sacrificed.

After [rescueDelay_duration], a rescue shuttle will come to pick up the survivors. You'll need to get them all on board within [leaveDelay_duration].
